I am sick and have taken the day off from work. To draw a parallel between this real-life situation and my KSP world, I will not be working on my main project in the game today.

But... I still want to play the game. So help me decide:

What shall I do in KSP today? I'll choose based on A) My skill level (moderate); Mods required (few or none); c) Pure arbitrary selection (maniacal laugh).

Recreate the Curiosity landing.

Apollo-style Mun mission.

Space station around Eve.

Journey to Pol (it's so neglected, there might be an Easter Egg no one else has seen yet!).

Mun Easter Egg hunt.

There is so much to do in this game, I'm surprised you are having trouble coming up with ideas.
